data.expected_result: You shouldn't be allowed to submit the edit.
data.short_description: It's possible to edit messages without send messages permissions
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message on any channel - Enter editing message, change text, but don't click send/press enter - Ask admin to revoke your permissions to send messages - Click send
